description: This file defines the MainActivity class for an Android application, managing the login screen UI, handling user input events, observing login state changes via the ViewModel, and updating the UI accordingly.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main activity class for handling the login interface, user interactions, and login state rendering.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle method to initialize UI elements and set up event handling.

methods.name: onDestroy
methods.description: Lifecycle method to clean up observers when activity is destroyed.

methods.name: setupIntents
methods.description: Sets up text change listeners on input fields and click listener on login button to dispatch intents.

methods.name: observeState
methods.description: Subscribes to the login state observable from the ViewModel.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Updates UI components based on the current login state, including showing loading, success, or error messages.
